text:
Created attachment 26848
Fix for this bug

build/apr_hints.m4 adds "-DCYGWIN" to $(CPPFLAGS), but this is totally redundant.
Although this does not causes any problem and it's currently unused by all source codes, I suggest to remove it.
If in the future there will be the need to test if CygWin is the target platform, then you will have to check for __CYGWIN__ that is the default macro defined there.
creator: carlo.bramix@libero.it

text: Committed to apr trunk with r1529668.  I'll test with the 1.5.x branch soon.
creator: trawick@apache.org
